item.description:
June's meeting will be a business meeting. We have a lot to go over. Now we need to get back to running this orginization a llittle.

We've had dynamic speakers like former FAA investigator Bob Martens, FAA FAAST TEAM for the FAA Jim Adams, Controller, The Bob Adelizzi, Harrier and Delta pilot, Captain Keith McKinley and more...

We'll be discussing the possible Wings and Wheels show for the fall. Young Eagles success flights and more. The decision on a BOD. July's co meeting with the Marlboro Chapter... Also the previous Fly Outs, Maine's Lighthose tour, Keene's Aviation Day...

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 June Meetup
